data.what_is:
Spectrm is the leading conversational marketing platform for consumer brands to instantly engage their audience on the world's largest messaging channels. Marketers use Spectrm to design custom chatbots and connect them to their paid and organic growth channels. Spectrm's best in class chatbot analytics, marketing automation tools and conversational AI make it easy for you to personalize customer experiences at scale and optimize your chatbot marketing funnel. No coding required.

Spectrm is used to optimize paid acquisition marketing by instantly connecting audiences to bots from Facebook and Instagram ads using click to Messenger campaigns. Organic social teams automate their Instagram messaging and Facebook page inbox using Spectrm's conversational AI. Growth teams connect their bots to conversational display ads in Google DV360 using Spectrm and AdLingo. Integrations with Google Business Messages enable consumers to discover marketing chatbots built with Spectrm via organic Google search, paid search campaigns, Google maps and more.

Your audience wants to message your brand and learn more before they buy. With Spectrm, you can automate one to one conversations with customers on the websites and apps where they spend all their time online. Accelerate purchase decisions by engaging customers in their moment of need. Use declared data customers share in chat to personalize recommendations in real-time. Reduce your dependence on third party data and tracking technologies to understand what your customer wants.

initial_reviews.review_title: Creating meaningful conversations with Spectrm
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Spectrm?
Spectrm makes it easy to build interactive Messenger chatbots to integrate with click to Messenger campaigns. It's simple to connect specific chatbot conversations to ads on Instagram and Facebook using the entrypoint tool. This helps test different chatbot conversations and ad combinations. When combined with conversation analytics, you can understand what works and what doesn't. Automation tool helped send personal reminders to anyone who dropped off. This increased the engagement a lot.

The customer success team at Spectrm is extremely engaged and responsive during both the launch process and every phase of campaign rollout afterwards. I was especially impressed with how they carefully ensured the client to understand the whole process and feel comfortable with the solutions proposed, e.g. when dealing with sensitive topics like breast cancer.

All these features and support from the Spectrm team helped us create an interactive health check up on Messenger for CoppaFeel! that beat every brand lift performance benchmark for the non-profit vertical on Facebook. It's now a Messenger success story.

What do you dislike about Spectrm?
Building all the segments for re-engagement automation takes a while and can be pretty complex. Also, not always easy to keep all the different conversations and connected ads organised.

What problems is Spectrm solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of the main problems we solved with Spectrm was engaging a young audience about potential health risks on Instagram.
Serious topics don't need a serious tone: Our interactive and playful adverts inviting the audience to use the bot for a self-check resonated the most with a younger audience (action intent for 18-24 year olds - 6.3pts).
Creating an interactive health check up bot on Messenger meant we could make people comfortable with health topics in a format that was really interactive and engaging. The impact was huge. 22% of people subscribed for monthly reminders, which was a key objective for CoppaFeel as a charity. We did a Messenger brand lift test on Facebook. It showed the click to Messenger campaign performed nearly 3x higher than the industry average on every indicator. Ad recall was over 24 pts higher, campaign awareness saw a 7.9 lift and action intent was +4.9 pts.

Many of us are used to old school ways of reaching customers:  tedious tracking, manually defined audiences, expensive and time consuming customer research surveys.  The chatbots I built with Spectrm obliterated all the old, resource-zapping methods and replaced them with an easy way to capture boatloads of insights on my target audiences that I was then able to easily port into my marketing campaigns.

One of the Click to Messenger Facebook campaigns I ran with Spectrm's chatbot had engagement rates that were through the roof. We automated personalized re-engagement messages for every drop-off. 4 out of every 5 customers we engaged with on Facebook performed the action I wanted them to take - that's an 80% success rate. I've never seen that type of performance with any other partner or channel.

I was apprehensive that building out the chatbot, setting up the retargeting, connecting my campaigns, and exporting insights would be a hassle, but the platform was intuitive.  Additionally, their customer success were responsive at every step and anticipated all my questions.

What do you dislike about Spectrm?
There is quite a lot of functionality in the platform that can be a lot to digest.  They've built the product to serve any need or use case, ranging from brand objectives to dr performance goals, so make sure you are clear on what you want to achieve before you start building out.

What problems is Spectrm solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was looking for a cheaper, effective way to reach and learn more about my customers that didn't require a lot of dev work and didn't require a lot of 'change management' efforts.  Spectrm accomplished it all.
